contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 23, 2003 D Leicestershire BBA (Leicester) Contest (Third Section)
Leicestershire BBA (Leicester) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Leicestershire Brass Band Association (Leicester) Contest leicester-contest-3rd-section
Guthlaxton College, Wigston, Leicestershire, England, UK 10 bands played in this combined 3rd and 4th section.
Best instrumentalist: solo euphonium, Stamford. Highest placed 4th section band: Linthwaite.
Nov. 18, 2010, 5:07 p.m. July 22, 2013, 9:24 a.m.
1 Carlton Brass Tony Wilson Hollywood!
2 Shirland Training Band Marie Smith Dimensions
3 Hitchin Band Gary Carney
7 Ratby Co-operative Mid Band Geoff Newman Variations on Laudate Dominum
9 Long Eaton Silver Prize Band Sharon Stansfield
Unknown Result Hathern Youth B Mike Cooper
Unknown Result Skegness Silver Band Steve Walker
Unknown Result Linthwaite Silver Band Steve Platten
Unknown Result Stamford Band Gary Wyatt Purcell Variations [Downie]
Unknown Result Syston Band Robert Boulter Kaleidoscope [Sparke]
